
Parameters
================================================================================

Row {.tabset}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Fixed parameters

```{r}
plot_par(fixed_par, color = ~model, legendgroup = ~model, colors = cols)
```


Row {.tabset}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Random parameters (r)

```{r}
plot_trend(random_par$log_r, color = ~model, legendgroup = ~model, colors = cols, ylab = "r")
```

`r if ("log_n" %in% names(random_par)) "### (n)"`

```{r, eval = "log_n" %in% names(random_par)}
plot_trend(random_par$log_n, color = ~model, legendgroup = ~model, colors = cols, frame = ~age, ylab = "n")
```

### (f)

```{r}
plot_trend(random_par$log_f, x = ~year, color = ~model, legendgroup = ~model, colors = cols, frame = ~age, ylab = "f")
```

`r if ("log_m" %in% names(random_par)) "### (m)"`

```{r, eval = "log_m" %in% names(random_par)}
plot_trend(random_par$log_m, x = ~year, color = ~model, legendgroup = ~model, colors = cols, frame = ~age_block, ylab = "m")
```
